entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing late in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 23 April 2023
